verse.roman:
svarbhānoḥ suprabhāṁ kanyām
uvāha namuciḥ kila
vṛṣaparvaṇas tu śarmiṣṭhāṁ
yayātir nāhuṣo balī

synonyms: svarbhānoḥ—of Svarbhānu; suprabhām—Suprabhā; kanyām—the daughter; uvāha—married; namuciḥ—Namuci; kila—indeed; vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ—of Vṛṣaparvā; tu—but; śarmiṣṭhām—Śarmiṣṭhā; yayātiḥ—King Yayāti; nāhuṣaḥ—the son of Nahuṣa; balī—very powerful.
translation: The daughter of Svarbhānu named Suprabhā was married by Namuci. The daughter of Vṛṣaparvā named Śarmiṣṭhā was given to the powerful King Yayāti, the son of Nahuṣa.
